hero.title: Welcome to Abreez Group
hero.subtitle: Leading provider of promotional gifts and integrated corporate solutions

about.title: About Abreez Group
about.description1: Founded in 2013, Abreez Group has rapidly grown to become the leading provider of promotional gifts and integrated corporate solutions in the Middle East. With a strong presence in the UAE and Saudi Arabia, we cater to diverse needs across the region.
about.description2: Our commitment to quality and innovation has earned us the ISO certification and numerous accolades. We're driven by our vision to be the most inspiring brand in the industry, delivering creative and impactful solutions that exceed expectations.

usb.title: Custom USB Drives for Tech Conference
usb.description: Branded USB drives with preloaded conference materials for a major tech event.

bottles.title: Eco-Friendly Water Bottles for Corporate Retreat
bottles.description: Customized reusable water bottles for a company-wide sustainability initiative.

giftBoxes.title: Luxury Gift Boxes for VIP Clients
giftBoxes.description: Bespoke gift boxes featuring premium products for high-value clients.

apparel.title: Branded Apparel for Sports Team
apparel.description: Custom-designed and printed uniforms for a professional sports team.

items.text: Abreez Group has consistently delivered high-quality promotional products that have significantly boosted our brand visibility. Their attention to detail and customer service is unparalleled.
items.author: John Doe

items.text: Working with Abreez Group has been a game-changer for our marketing efforts. Their innovative solutions and quick turnaround times have made them an invaluable partner.
items.author: Jane Smith

items.text: The team at Abreez Group goes above and beyond to ensure client satisfaction. Their creative approach to promotional products has helped us stand out in a crowded market.
items.author: Alex Johnson

items.question: What types of promotional products do you offer?
items.answer: We offer a wide range of promotional products including custom USB drives, eco-friendly water bottles, branded apparel, luxury gift boxes, and much more. Our product line is constantly expanding to meet the diverse needs of our clients.

items.question: How long does it take to fulfill an order?
items.answer: Order fulfillment time varies depending on the product and quantity. Typically, our standard production time is 7-10 business days after artwork approval. For rush orders, please contact our sales team to discuss expedited options.

items.question: Do you offer design services?
items.answer: Yes, we have an in-house design team that can help bring your ideas to life. Whether you need a logo created or assistance with product design, our experienced designers are here to help.

items.question: What is your minimum order quantity?
items.answer: Our minimum order quantity varies by product. For most items, we have a minimum order of 100 units. However, for some specialty or custom-made products, the minimum may be higher. Please contact us for specific product minimums.

items.question: Do you ship internationally?
items.answer: Yes, we offer international shipping to most countries. Shipping costs and delivery times will vary based on the destination and chosen shipping method. Please contact our sales team for a quote on international orders.

contact.title: Ready to Elevate Your Brand?
contact.subtitle: Let's create impactful promotional solutions together. Contact us today to discuss your unique needs and discover how Abreez Group can help you stand out in the market.
